display_long_description:
Join our Discord for early access and exclusive updates: https://discord.gg/symphoni

# Wave Your Wand. Command the Music. Become the Wizard of Symphonies.
Welcome to **Symphoni**, where you can be a grand musical wizard who breathes new life into classical music. Unlike traditional rhythm games, **Symphoni** lets you conduct, cast spells, and transform reality while grooving to the classics.

[media]


# 🎼 Wield the Power of Music
Conduct the symphony with your wand and cast spellbinding portals to the rhythm of classical masterpieces.
[media]

# 🌎 Step Into Magical Realms
Experience visually stunning MR transitions as your living room transforms into enchanting symphonic worlds.
[media]
# 🎵 16 Timeless Masterpieces
Challenge yourself with Tchaikovsky, Beethoven, and more across three difficulty levels and four magical realms.
[media]
# 🔮 Collect Wands & Unlock Crystals
Level up your magical abilities, unlock 25 unique achievement crystals, and collect four legendary wands.
[media]
# 🪄 Master the Magic of Motion
Play with **hand-tracking** for an immersive conducting experience, or use **controllers** for precise rhythmic gameplay.
[media]
# 📝 Symphoni Composer (Coming Soon)
Compose your own musical challenges and try out **user-generated symphonies**. Join our discord to learn more!
[media]
#  ✨ Experience the Magic of Music
With **16 masterpieces, 3 difficulties, wand collection, collectible crystals, and a custom song editor + free song updates** planned in the near future, get ready to raise your wand and experience the magic of classical music like never before.

# Wave Your Wand. Command the Music. Become the Wizard of Symphonies.
Welcome to **Symphoni**, where you can be a grand musical wizard who breathes new life into classical music. Unlike traditional rhythm games, **Symphoni** lets you conduct, cast spells, and transform reality while grooving to the classics.
